commandDescription: Validates alignment between XML and CSV representations of permission sets using string comparison or logic comparison
inputFlagDescription: Comma-separated list of permission set names to validate (without extension). If not specified, all permission sets will be validated
modeFlagDescription: Validation mode: 'string' for full string comparison, 'logic' for in-memory structure comparison (default: %s)
noItemsFound: No permission sets found to validate
validationSummary: Validation Summary: %s permission sets validated, %s aligned, %s misaligned
examples: sf easysources permissionsets arealigned -i Admin_Access,Custom_Permissions -m string
sf easysources permissionsets arealigned --sort false --mode string
